channel.title: Comments for page "Power Over 9000"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Power Over 9000"

item.title: Reference
item.content:encoded: Power Over 9000 is actually a double reference. Obviously, it is clearly a reference to Dragonball Z; but more precisely, it refers to a viral video. The "OVER NINE THOUSAND" video takes a clip from the first dubbed Dragonball Z, specifically the scene where Nappa and Bejita discuss Goku's oddly high 'power level.' The video replays Brian Drummond's over-exaggerated response, adding different video and audio effects each time, adding to the silliness of the statement.
